targets.rawSql:
with
balance_4h_ts as (
  select *
  from (
          select time_bucket_gapfill('4h', datetime) as datetime,
              locf(avg(token_balance)) as balance
          from beefy_report.vault_investor_balance_diff_4h_snaps_3d_ts
          -- make sure we select the previous snapshot to fill the graph
          where datetime between ('${__from:date}'::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '3d') and '${__to:date}'::TIMESTAMPTZ
              and chain = '$chain'
              and vault_id in ($vault_id)
              and investor_address = evm_address_to_bytea('$investor_address')
          group by 1
  ) as t
  where balance is not null
)
select 
    b.datetime as time,
    sum(
        (
          (b.balance::NUMERIC * vpt.avg_ppfs::NUMERIC) / POW(10, 18 + vpt.want_decimals)::NUMERIC
        )
        * vpt.avg_want_usd_value
    ) as value
from balance_4h_ts b
left join beefy_derived.vault_ppfs_and_price_4h_ts vpt 
    on vpt.chain = '$chain'
    and vpt.vault_id in ($vault_id)
    and b.datetime = vpt.datetime
    and $__timeFilter(vpt.datetime)
where vpt.vault_id is not null
group by 1
order by 1

with
balance_4h_ts as (
  select *
  from (
          select time_bucket_gapfill('4h', datetime) as datetime,
              locf(avg(token_balance)) as balance
          from beefy_report.vault_investor_balance_diff_4h_snaps_3d_ts
          -- make sure we select the previous snapshot to fill the graph
          where datetime between ('${__from:date}'::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '3d') and '${__to:date}'::TIMESTAMPTZ
              and chain = '$chain'
              and vault_id in ($vault_id)
              and investor_address = evm_address_to_bytea('$investor_address')
          group by 1
  ) as t
  where balance is not null
)
select 
    b.datetime as time,
    sum(
       (b.balance::NUMERIC * vpt.avg_ppfs::NUMERIC) / POW(10, 18 + vpt.want_decimals)::NUMERIC
    ) as value
from balance_4h_ts b
left join beefy_derived.vault_ppfs_and_price_4h_ts vpt 
    on vpt.chain = '$chain'
    and vpt.vault_id in ($vault_id)
    and b.datetime = vpt.datetime
    and $__timeFilter(vpt.datetime)
where vpt.vault_id is not null
group by 1
order by 1

list.definition:
select distinct chain
from beefy_report.vault_investor_balance_diff_4h_snaps_3d_ts
where investor_address = evm_address_to_bytea('$investor_address')
list.name: chain
list.query:
select distinct chain
from beefy_report.vault_investor_balance_diff_4h_snaps_3d_ts
where investor_address = evm_address_to_bytea('$investor_address')

list.definition:
select distinct vault_id 
from beefy_report.vault_investor_balance_diff_4h_snaps_3d_ts
where vault_id is not null and chain = '$chain' and investor_address = evm_address_to_bytea('$investor_address')
list.name: vault_id
list.query:
select distinct vault_id 
from beefy_report.vault_investor_balance_diff_4h_snaps_3d_ts
where vault_id is not null and chain = '$chain' and investor_address = evm_address_to_bytea('$investor_address')

list.definition:
select want_price_oracle_id
from beefy_raw.vault
where chain = '$chain'
and vault_id in ($vault_id)
list.name: token_symbol
list.query:
select want_price_oracle_id
from beefy_raw.vault
where chain = '$chain'
and vault_id in ($vault_id)
